amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being used in contravention of that portion of OMB Circular No. A-11, section 22.2, that states that in testimony before Congressional committees and communication with Members of Congress, witnesses will give frank and complete answers to all questions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 215 (Roll no. 354).
